flawed_nl_solution:
The kingfisher caught 13 + 7 = <<13+7=16>>16 fish.
The pelican and kingfisher caught 13 + 16 = <<13+16=29>>29 fish
The fisherman caught 3 x 29 = <<3*29=87>>87 fish
The fisherman caught 87 - 13 = <<87-13=74>>74 more fish than the pelican.
#### 74

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 16. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
